questions.text: 'Call me Ishmael.' For what book is this the opening line?

questions.explanation:
Bag of Bones.

questions.text: 'On the bus to the deathcamp, Landau searches for an image, some brilliant incisive metaphor for the fields of stunted brown sunflowers, their fat dwarfish heads drooping stupidly on their crackling stalks.' For what book is this the opening line?
